import './index.scss'; import { useRef } from 'react'; import Loader from 'react-loaders'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; const Contact = () => { const refForm = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault() emailjs.sendForm( 'service_cvz7hae', 'template_o2gz92b', refForm ).then( () => { alert('¡Mensaje enviado!') window.location.reload(false) }, () => { alert('No se pudo enviar el formulario') } ) } return ( <>

); } export default Contact;
